Commands.Dark Slash: 2-hit Dark melee BRV attack + HP attack  Self: 5 turns Dark Knight when landing hit on target (up to 3 levels; 1 level when HP damage dealt less than 75% of MAX BRV; 2 levels when 75% ≤ 99%; 3 levels when 100% or greater)
Commands.Dark Bind: Dark group magic BRV attack + group HP attack  HP damage shared  Moderately recovers HP based on HP damage dealt  Recovery limit: 15% of MAX HP  All Targets: Fair chance 5 turns Sap
Commands.Dark Stream: 4-HIT Dark AoE melee BRV+HP Attack  Deals 100% HP Damage to all enemies   While 「Dark Knight」 is active and HP is above 80%:  - Turns into 「Dark Stream+」
Commands.Dark Stream+: While 「Dark Knight」 is active and HP > 80%

Artifacts.BRV Guard Up: Raises Defense Power by 10% when BRV is over 50% Max BRV
Artifacts.Proof of Power Boost: Increases the effects of Proof of Power by 5%
Artifacts.Mighty Dark Slash: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Dark Slash by 10%
Artifacts.Mighty Dark Bind: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Dark Bind by 10%

Passives.Dark Slash Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Dark Slash.
Passives.Critical Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with critical hits.
Passives.Attack Proficiency: Slightly raises Attack up to 10 times after using a BRV attack or an ability.
Passives.Dark Bind Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Dark Bind.
Passives.Heal Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack for 1 turn after HP Recovery.
Passives.Dark Slash Charge: Increases the max uses of Dark Slash by 1.
Passives.Imperial Subject: Upon recovering HP, if the healing amount exceeds Max HP, the excess is converted to BRV.The BRV value granted is limited to 150% of Initial BRV.
Passives.Dark Bind Charge: Increases the max uses of Dark Bind by 1.
Passives.Proof of Power: Slightly raises Initial BRV, Max BRV, Attack and Defense while Dark Knight is active.
Passives.Speed Dark Knight: Moderately raises SPD while Dark Knight active
Passives.Dark Slash Extension: When using Dark Slash:  Moderate BRV damage boost  50% HP damage dealt to non-targets
Passives.Dark Knight Attack Boost Up: Moderately raises MAX BRV, ATK while Dark Knight active
Passives.Dark Bind Extension: When using Dark Bind:  Moderate BRV damage boost  Slightly increased HP recovery based on HP damage  Excess HP recovery distributed to allies; recovery limit: 10% of ally's MAX HPBRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ while Dark Knight active, HP at least 50% of MAX

Weapons.Ancient Sword CP: 15: Raises the potency of Dark Slash.Grants Small Attack Up for 5 turns.
Weapons.Sleep Sword CP: 35: Raises the potency of Dark Bind.Raises the HP recovery limit.Moderately increases BRV damage to a single target.Raises the success rate of Sap.Grants Dark Knight for 5 turns if the ability hits.
